title: Buying rp gone wrong
body: Yesterday i tried buying 10 dollars worth of rp. after i entered my credit card information i accepted and it was taking awhile to process. after awhile i got an error message and i didn't get any rp or receipt but the money was still taken from my account. what can i do? if i look at my purchase transactions on my card it shows that the 10 dollars was taken from riot.

replies.body: Ahhhh it sounds like your bank might have put those funds in a pending state in preparation for that transaction, but since the purchase never went through the funds were never pulled out of pending. It's pretty typical for banks to hold that money in pending for a day or so, so be sure to check the state of that transaction to see if it's "pending" or fully charged. You're always welcome to reach out to our billing team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) as well if that money was definitely taken out of your account.

I had this happen as well too. As luck would have it, its for a 5 dollar purchase and not the 50 dollar purchase I made moments before. I'm going to assume that the Initial loadout client is based on a web wrapper?   As feedback, suggestion,  I think when the user initiates a purchase flow, it should generate an auth token for that purchase, store it awaiting for receipt and lock out any additional purchase until receipt. Then the remote server can process the payment or send back a failure. If sever times out , the local client would then not keep rebilling. tokens would expire locally after some time so that if the server goes down and cannot respond with recept then it would invalidate that lock later so they can try again.
Y'know, this may not actually be such a terrible idea. I don't know the specifics on how the billing systems work, but I think that it's worth passing along to our dev team for sure ^_^!
there is a problem now i just checked my account and it is no longer pending it is now fully charged and i dont have the rp on my account
No worries, as I said in my first response you should go ahead and reach out to our billing team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to get that fixed up!
i checked my account and it is pending. what do i do to fix it? thx for the reply btw
That pending charge will fall off after a certain amount of time, which is purely up to your own bank at this point. Typically they fall off after 2-3 business days though!
oh okay thanks broooo. i want a free 1k rp for the inconvenience lol XD
